translation.tappler_is_free_descr: tappler app offers free services listing, if you are individual or business owner, you too can list your services on the app with no cost whatsoever.
translation.all_what_you_need_descr: All what you need to do is to focus on growing your business and leave the customers on us. It is easy and simple.
translation.you_can_get_customers_descr: You can get customers from the first day you join tappler, build a strong profile and leave the rest on us
translation.create_an_account_to_join_descr: Create an account to join our growing network of service providers or login to your account
translation.choose_one_of_the_following_to_signin: Choose one of the following to sign in
translation.choose_one_of_the_following_to_sign_up: Choose one of the following to sign up
translation.we_could_not_log_you_descr: We could not log you in because your email Or password is not correct
translation.where_do_you_provide_your_service: Where do you provide your service?
translation.search_for_a_neighborhood_or_area: Search for a neighborhood or area
translation.verification_code_has_been_sent_to_email: Verification code has been sent to email address
translation.please_enter_the_verification_code_here: Please enter the verification code here
translation.choose_this_account_descr: Choose this account type if you do the work by yourself
translation.choose_this_account_business_descr: Choose this account type if you are a registered business
translation.type_your_first_and_last_name_descr: Type your first and last name as showing on your ID
translation.your_address_will_not_be_descr: Your address will not be shared with customers
translation.information_about_you_descr: Provide information about you and your services and why you are the best choice to perform this service. This Info may influence the customer when choosing the service providers. Mention the information that may be of interest to the customer, such as the nature of the services, quality of work, locations, speed of response etc..
translation.phone_numbers_or_emails_descr: Phone numbers or emails are not allowed in this area, it will be deleted.
translation.type_the_information_about_you_here: Type the information about you here

translation.the_profile_photo_the_descr: The profile photo is the first thing the customers will see when they search for services. Here are some helpful tips To help you choose the best profile photo:
translation.make_sure_to_smile_descr: Make sure to smile in the photo, you will look great
translation.use_contrasting_colors_descr: Use contrasting colors and enough lighting
translation.promotional_photos_or_pictures_descr: Promotional photos or pictures are not allowed
translation.provide_your_business_days_and_hours: Provide your business days and hours
translation.i_accept_the_following_payments_descr: I accept the following payments directly from customers
translation.are_you_sure_you_want_to_logout: Are you sure you want to logout?
translation.are_you_sure_you_want_to_exit_before_des: Are you sure you want to exit before completing the registration?
translation.pictures_are_one_of_the_descr: Pictures are one of the most influential things that affects People to take a decision to purchase a goods or services.
translation.upload_photos_and_videos_descr: Upload photos and videos for you doing the service
translation.photos_videos_for_services_you_did: Photos & Videos for services you did
translation.we_will_send_you_a_verification_code: We will send you a verification code
translation.verification_code_has_been_sent_descr: Verification code has been sent to {{number}}
translation.please_enter_the_OTP_code_here: Please enter the OTP code here
translation.your_mobile_number_has_been_verified: Your mobile number has been verified!
translation.how_did_you_know_about_us: How did you know about us?
translation.i_acknowledge_that_descr: I acknowledge that I have read and agree to the
translation.i_must_login_to_my_account_at_least_desc: I must login to my account at least once a week to avoid placing my account in idle state that will result in not receiving service requests.
translation.my_review_rating_must_be_descr: My review rating must be at least 3 stars to avoid my account to get suspended
translation.i_agree_not_to_place_text_descr: I agree not to place text or photo adds in my profile as well as posting or discussing sexual or religious content in the platform.
translation.you_have_successfully_registered_a_pro_a: You have successfully registered a Pro account
translation.for_tutorials_and_how_to_use_the_app_des: For tutorials and how to use the app visit “Help” Section on the app settings.
translation.password_reset_descr: To reset your password we will send one time password (OTP) to your registered email address.
translation.please_enter_a_valid_descr: Please enter a valid email address to continue
translation.we_sent_you_an_email_with_verification_d: We sent you an email with verification link. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to verify your email.
translation.dont_see_your_service_tap_here: Don`t see your service? Tap here
translation.if_you_cannot_find_the_services_descr: If you cannot find the services you are offering in our app, please fill the following form and we will inform you when it becomes available. Medical related services will not be part of the app services.
translation.we_will_let_you_know_when_the_service_be: We will let you know when the service become available
translation.only_the_owner_can_register: Only the owner can register for Business account!
translation.this_name_will_appear_to_customers: This name will appear to customers
translation.the_profile_photo_is_the_first_descr: The profile photo is the first thing the customers will see when they search for services. Here are some helpful tips To help you choose the best profile photo:
translation.we_recommend_to_use_only_high_resolution: We recommend to use only high resolution photos
translation.use_photos_that_best_represents_your_ser: Use photos that best represents your services
translation.put_photos_with_contrasting_colors_and_e: Put photos with contrasting colors and enough lighting
translation.use_professional_photos_such_as_stock_ph: Use professional photos such as stock photography
translation.please_grant_permission_descr: Please grant permission to access the photo library in the app settings.
translation.enter_your_registered_email_we_will_send: Enter your registered email, we will send you a verification link to rest your password.
translation.promotional_photos_are_not_allowed_and_w: Promotional photos are not allowed and will be deleted
